description:
Kazuma and Kawachi both try and find a way to make a bread that the manager’s horse will eat. Kawachi decides to use oats, while Kazuma makes butter.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Not Baaaad!! Ultimate Butter Is the Clincher!
Quel délice !! L’essentiel est dans le beurre !
Umee!! Kimete wa Kyuukyoku no Butter!
แบ่ะๆๆๆ เคล็ดลับอยู่ที่สุดยอดเนย!
美メェ~!! 決め手は究極のバター!
